name: protocol-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Aave protocol v2 and v3

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${NETWORK}-${VERSION}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.deploy:hosted:goerli-v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=mahalend/protocol-v3-mainnet env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:mainnet-v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=mainnet env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=mahalend/mainnet env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:harmony-v3: VERSION=v3 BLOCKCHAIN=v3 NETWORK=harmony env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=aave/protocol-v3-harmony env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:v2: npm run deploy:hosted:mainnet && npm run deploy:hosted:polygon-v2 && npm run deploy:hosted:avalanche-v2
scripts.deploy:hosted:v2-testnet: npm run deploy:hosted:goerli-v2 && npm run deploy:hosted:mumbai-v2 && npm run deploy:hosted:fuji-v2
scripts.deploy:hosted:v3: npm run deploy:hosted:avalanche-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:polygon-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:optimism-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:fantom-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:arbitrum-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:harmony-v3
scripts.deploy:hosted:v3-testnet: npm run deploy:hosted:goerli-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:mumbai-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:fuji-v3 && npm run deploy:hosted:arbitrum-goerli && npm run deploy:hosted:optimism-goerli && npm run deploy:hosted:fantom-testnet

author: AAVE <tech@aave.com>
